The claim was found to be false as Flowe: the parent company of Wonder Bread, did not make any announcement about cutting ties with the NRA and other conservative companies.
The CEO of Flower Foods was identified a: Shiver, not Lamont Cranston, as falsely stated in the claim.
The claim originated from a Facebook pag: s Last Line of Defense, a website known for creating and spreading fake news under the guise of satire.
The: About" section of America's Last Line of Defense Facebook page explicitly states that nothing on the page is real and that it is a collection of satirical content created by liberal trolls masquerading as conservatives.
